channel.title: Get your server hosted on a dedicated server
channel.description:
Im not much of a Rs2 Server Coder. I have a dedicated server validated for 12 months. I own the server & have full access to run server.
I am running a server called Yarnova scape now coded by Owned 112. - The server ip is project-czar.org - Yes if you purchase a domain that can be your server ip address. Heres some pictures of the Server - [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/vz8two.jpg[/img]
Server must have - Full Silabs - The Latest. Commands do not have to be on there but are wanted. Full Special attacks. Most weapons should have working special attacks. Lots of shops. The more shops that sell things the merrier. Unique starting place. Most users hate varrock starting places. But anywere is fine.
Rules - You think im going to steal your server? Please dont post here then. The last time i done this i had some retarded 12 year old kid posting here saying i was going to steal everyones server. Seriously, its for your benefit.
Catch - There are no hidden catches. I want to be owner status on the server & you must update it atleast 2 times per week. Thats not much is it?

project-czar.org

item.title: Get your server hosted on a dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @gh0styscape gh0styscape
item.description:
@gh0styscape wrote:

You would need to set the Nameservers to the dedicated servers ip then add it via Plesk. You then can join with your domain.

Read full topic
item.source: Get your server hosted on a dedicated server

Server must have - Full Silabs - The Latest. Commands do not have to be on there but are wanted. Full Special attacks. Most weapons should have working special attacks. Lots of shops. The more shops that sell things the merrier. Unique starting place. Most users hate varrock starting places. But anywere is fine.
